Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Castillo "DaemonRoot"
Reviews.Content: I got this phone so I can continue hooked to my job, it's fast and powerful. I primarily use it for email and instant messaging, fits great in your pocket and syncs in a few seconds even when connected to slow networks.I heard people complaining about the 2MP camera, but if you need to take sharp pictures then get a Canon! :)I still gotta keep playing with it to take advantage of all its features but so far it's a five stars phone to me!

ProductInfo.Features:
2G Network: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 (Quad-Band); 3G Network: HSDPA 900 1900, 2100 MHz (7.2 Mbps); HSUPA 900 1900, 2100 MHz (5.76 Mbps)
Windows Mobile 6.5 with Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Outlook, Gmail and Hotmail
ssisted GPS and Google Maps with Latitude, Street View, Traffic, POI Search
Direct link to Social Networks (Facebook, YouTube, Flickr, Blogger)
2MP camera with video recording
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked ACER BeTOUCH E100 3G GPS Smart Phone White - International version
